full_title: I Can Do It With a Broken Heart by Taylor Swift
title: I Can Do It With a Broken Heart
title_with_featured: I Can Do It With a Broken Heart

description.plain:
“I Can Do It With a Broken Heart” recounts Swift’s experience of an emotional rollercoaster touring following a breakup.

The announcement of the ending of Swift’s six year long relationship with British actor Joe Alwyn would come in April 2023, less than a month after her record breaking “Eras Tour” would commence.

Thus, Taylor felt like she had to mask her sadness with lyrics such as “I’m so depressed, I act like it’s my birthday every day.” While patting herself on the back with the lyric “You know you’re good when you can even do it with a broken heart.”

On July 15th 2024, the track was officially made the second single of THE TORTURED POETS DEPARTMENT.

embed_content: Read “I Can Do It With a Broken Heart” by Taylor Swift on Genius
recording_location: Electric Lady Studios (New York, NY) / Conway Recording (Los Angeles, CA)

body.plain:
“I Can Do It With a Broken Heart” recounts Swift’s experience of an emotional rollercoaster touring following a breakup.

The announcement of the ending of Swift’s six year long relationship with British actor Joe Alwyn would come in April 2023, less than a month after her record breaking “Eras Tour” would commence.

Thus, Taylor felt like she had to mask her sadness with lyrics such as “I’m so depressed, I act like it’s my birthday every day.” While patting herself on the back with the lyric “You know you’re good when you can even do it with a broken heart.”

On July 15th 2024, the track was officially made the second single of THE TORTURED POETS DEPARTMENT.
